comments.body: Can you add a comment to clientPoolImpl saying it reuses restclient for resources/kind of the same group version? It's less obvious after the interface changes.

Yes, will do.

On Tue, Sep 13, 2016 at 9:26 PM, Chao Xu notifications@github.com wrote:

> In pkg/client/typed/dynamic/client_pool.go
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/32549#discussion_r78673815
> :
> 
> > @@ -28,16 +29,21 @@ import (
> > 
> >  // ClientPool manages a pool of dynamic clients.
> >  type ClientPool interface {
> 
> Can you add a comment to clientPoolImpl saying it reuses restclient for
> resources/kind of the same group version? It's less obvious after the
> interface changes.
>

Awesome. Later we can make kubectl's builder use this, perhaps.
